Mon, 27 Jan 2025 16:03:00 +0000 Ezekiel Muli’aumaseali’i, 10, has cerebral palsy and has done four intensive therapy programmes with Australian company Centre of Movement. Ezekiel is pictured with his parents Moemoe and Neum Muli’aumaseali’i and therapist Stephen Pennisi.
